statements: DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND resource_type = 'electricity';
DELETE FROM ResourceConservation WHERE building_name = 'Building A';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE building_name = 'Building A';
DELETE FROM ResourceConservation WHERE resource_type = 'Water' AND saved_units > 100;
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE electricity_consumption > 1000 AND water_consumption < 500
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE appliance_id = 1 AND energy_usage > 100.0;
DELETE FROM ResourceConsumption WHERE device_id = 2 AND resource_type = 'electricity';
DELETE FROM EfficiencyMetrics WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND resource_id = 2;
